ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: llyas was one of the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily Elias is one of the apostles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely, Elias too was among the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed Ilyas is one of the Noble Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, Ilyas was one of the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Ilyas was most surely of the apostles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Elias too was one of the Envoys;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! Elias was of those sent (to warn),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Elijah too was one of the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily, llyas was one of the sent ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed Ilyas was one of the apostles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So also was Elias among those sent (by Us).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, Iliyas (Elias) was one of the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And Elias (El Yaseen) was among the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Also Elijah was one of the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, Elias was from among the messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:123] And truly Elias (read [wa-inna Ilyās] with the initial hamza or without [wa-inna’l-yāsa) was [also] one of the messengers. Some think that this [Elias] was the son of Aaron’s brother — [Aaron] the brother of Moses; but some say that this [Elias] was some other [person], who was sent to the people living in and around Baalbak.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! Elias was of those sent (to warn)) his folk.
